name: Whale of a Tale
text:
[ Skill activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
[ Effect ]
Discard 1 card from your hand and add 1 "Fortress Whale" or "Fortress Whale's Oath" from your Deck to your hand. "Fortress Whale" monsters you control gain the following effects:
● Your opponent cannot target face-up WATER monsters you control with Spell/Trap cards or effects.
